title: Jr. System Engineer

title: Digital Public Relation Intern
responsibilities: Designed, Developed and Deployed an AI-powered prompt-based query system for PostgreSQL, enabling natural language data access and reducing query complexity for non-technical data research team, now used globally across DPR & Data Research department.
Extracted data using web scraping, maintained and standardized data with Beautiful Soup, Selenium, Scrapy, and SQL, enhancing data accuracy and reporting efficiency for business analysis.

achievements: Built System that is been currently been used world wide across multiple departments.
Increased personal and company efficiency drastically by about 60-70% by integrating AI Web Scraper to reduce idle time.

title: Data Analyst Intern
responsibilities: Increased data collection efficiency using Beautiful Soup, Parser and Selenium to streamline scraping processes from diverse sources by performing mass web scraping on over 250+ websites as data sources.
Developed automated ETL pipelines, reducing data update processing time and enhancing data availability for analysis.

achievements: Contributed and deployed software solutions to more than 5 companies including clients like Mahindra, RPG Group, Hindware, McKinsey & Company and Deloitte

title: Data Scientist Intern
responsibilities: Built and optimized statistical models, achieving predictive accuracy over 85% on client insights through hypothesis testing, forecasting, and classification.
Extracted, cleaned, and engineered features from databases using SQL, Pandas, and NumPy, while ensuring high-quality datasets and automated Shopify integration to display client data on dashboard.
Led a team to design visualizations and reports with Matplotlib and Seaborn guiding frontend team for required dashboard driving strategic decisions.

Designed and implemented a business intelligence transformer model to recommend improvements in business model to improve long term venture growth by leveraging ‘google-bert/bert-base-uncased’, fine-tuning it on financial (textual & numerical) data gathered including client reports, SEC: Reports and Financial Statements, Yahoo Finance, and Zoho Books.
achievements: Designed, Developer, and Deployed a Business-Intelligent-AI that provided business strategies using current strategies and financial output of the companies.
